verses.verse: And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from there toward the <S%H5045>south<s%> <S%H776>country<s%>, and <S%H3427>lived<s%> between <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> and <S%H7793>Shur<s%>, and <S%H1481>stayed<s%> in <S%H1642>Gerar<s%>.

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H413>of<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>, She is my <S%H269>sister<s%>: and <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H1642>Gerar<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%>, and <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H8283>Sarah<s%>.

But <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> in a <S%H2472>dream<s%> by <S%H3915>night<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4191>him<s%>, Behold, you are but a dead man, for the <S%H802>woman<s%> which you have <S%H3947>taken<s%>; for she is a <S%H1167>man<s%>'s <S%H1166>wife<s%>.
But <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> had not come <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H559>her<s%>: and he said, <S%H136>Lord<s%>, will you <S%H2026>kill<s%> also a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H1471>nation<s%>?

<S%H559>Said<s%> he not unto <S%H1931>me<s%>, She is my <S%H269>sister<s%>? and <S%H1931>she<s%>, <S%H1571>even<s%> <S%H1931>she<s%> herself <S%H559>said<s%>, He is my <S%H251>brother<s%>: in the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of my <S%H3824>heart<s%> and <S%H5356>innocency<s%> of my <S%H3709>hands<s%> have I done <S%H6213>this<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto him in a <S%H2472>dream<s%>, <S%H1571>Yes<s%>, I <S%H3045>know<s%> that you <S%H6213>did<s%> this in the <S%H8537>integrity<s%> of your <S%H3824>heart<s%>; for I also <S%H2820>stopped<s%> you from <S%H2398>sinning<s%> against <S%H5414>me<s%>: therefore I didn't allow you to touch <S%H5060>her<s%>.

Now therefore <S%H7725>restore<s%> the <S%H376>man<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>; for he is a <S%H5030>prophet<s%>, and he shall <S%H6419>pray<s%> for <S%H1157>you<s%>, and you shall <S%H2421>live<s%>: and if you <S%H7725>restore<s%> her <S%H3045>not<s%>, know you that you shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die<s%>, you, and all that are yours.

Therefore <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> rose <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>, and <S%H7121>called<s%> all his <S%H5650>servants<s%>, and <S%H1696>told<s%> all these <S%H1697>things<s%> in their <S%H241>ears<s%>: and the <S%H582>men<s%> were <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H3372>afraid<s%>.

Then <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H7121>called<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, and <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H6213>him<s%>, What have you done unto <S%H2398>us<s%>? And how have I offended <S%H935>you<s%>, that you have brought on me and on my <S%H4467>kingdom<s%> a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2401>sin<s%>? You have <S%H6213>done<s%> <S%H4639>deeds<s%> unto me that should not to be <S%H6213>done<s%>.
And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, <S%H4100>What<s%> saw <S%H7200>you<s%>, that you have <S%H6213>done<s%> this <S%H1697>thing<s%>?

And <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, Because I <S%H559>thought<s%>, <S%H7535>Surely<s%> the <S%H3374>fear<s%> of <S%H430>God<s%> is not in this <S%H4725>place<s%>; and they will kill <S%H2026>me<s%> for my <S%H802>wife<s%>'s <S%H1697>sake<s%>.

And yet <S%H546>indeed<s%> she is my <S%H269>sister<s%>; she is the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H1>father<s%>, but not the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of my <S%H517>mother<s%>; and she became my <S%H802>wife<s%>.

And it came to <S%H430>pass<s%>, when God caused me to <S%H8582>wander<s%> from my <S%H1>father<s%>'s <S%H1004>house<s%>, that I <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H2617>her<s%>, This is your kindness which you shall <S%H6213>show<s%> unto <S%H4725>me<s%>; at every place where we shall <S%H935>come<s%>, <S%H559>say<s%> of <S%H251>me<s%>, He is my brother.

And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> <S%H6629>sheep<s%>, and <S%H1241>oxen<s%>, and <S%H5650>menservants<s%>, and <S%H8198>womenservants<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them unto <S%H85>Abraham<s%>, and <S%H7725>restored<s%> him <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> his <S%H802>wife<s%>.
And <S%H40>Abimelech<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H776>Behold<s%>, my land is before <S%H6440>you<s%>: <S%H3427>live<s%> where it pleases <S%H2896>you<s%>.

And unto <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> he <S%H559>said<s%>, <S%H5414>Behold<s%>, I have given your <S%H251>brother<s%> a <S%H505>thousand<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%>: <S%H3682>behold<s%>, he is to you a covering of the <S%H5869>eyes<s%>, unto all that are with <S%H3198>you<s%>, and with all other: thus she was vindicated.

So <S%H85>Abraham<s%> <S%H6419>prayed<s%> unto <S%H430>God<s%>: and <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7495>healed<s%> <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>, and his <S%H802>wife<s%>, and his <S%H519>maidservants<s%>; and they gave birth to <S%H3205>sons<s%>.

For the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> had <S%H6113>fast<s%> closed <S%H6113>up<s%> all the <S%H7358>wombs<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H40>Abimelech<s%>, <S%H1697>because<s%> of <S%H8283>Sarah<s%> <S%H85>Abraham<s%>'s <S%H802>wife<s%>.
